message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.IT, cs.DS 

This paper deals with the problem of data regeneration in distributed storage systems, which is a topic related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and computer networks (cs.NI). The paper also proposes two approaches to minimize regeneration time, which involves optimization techniques and algorithms, making it relevant to systems and control (cs.SY) and information theory (cs.IT). Finally, the paper deals with the practical implementation of the proposed approaches, which falls under the category of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
